sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Login() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ email: '', password: '' }); const { login, error } = useAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const { email, password } = formData; const onChange = (e) => { setFormData((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, })); }; const onSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { await login({ email, password }); } catch (err) { console.error(err); } }; return (

Sign in to your account

{error && (
{error}
)}
Forgot your password?
Or continue with
Sign in with Google
); }
